actions.name: Wishmaker
actions.description:
Trigger: The user resolves Wish.
Effect: Connection - Wish. The user selections to utilize one of the following effects to utilize in place of Wish's normal Resolution effect:
- The target is healed 12 Ticks of HP, and creatures allied to the target in a 5m Burst of the target are healed 4 Ticks of HP.
- The target gains +3 stages to a Stat of the target's choice, and creatures allied to the target in a 2m Burst of the target gain +1 stage in that Stat, all for 7 Activations.
- The target is cured of all its Status Afflictions (except Weary), and creatures allied to the target in a 4m Burst of the target are healed of 1 random Status Affliction they possess.
- The target is loses 1 Weary and regains 20% of its max PP, minimum 20, and creatures allied to the target in a Burst 3 of the target regain 10 PP.
- The target loses 4 Ticks of HP, and creatures not allied to the target in a 5m Burst of the target lose 10 Ticks of HP.
